sentences.sentence: After becoming the youngest boss of a publicly listed German company when he took over Puma in 1993, he transformed the firm from a near-bankrupt plimsoll-maker into a trendy high-street brand.
sentences.translation: 1993年Zeitz先生接管了彪马公司，由此成为德国上市公司有史以来最年轻的老板，在那之后他成功地把这家濒临破产的橡皮底帆布鞋制造商转变为一个流行时尚品牌。
